toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This is an internal system field defined by the formula_extid field. Neither the formula_extid, nor the externalid field itself, is currently displayed on any Rootstock User pages.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: External Id
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__externalid__c

toolingEntityParticle.Label: formula_bypassmrp
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__formula_bypassmrp__c
toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>rstk__icixr__c.rstk__formula_bypassmrp__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <description>Used internally for setting the icixr_bypass in certain cases. Note that there are other criteria for the setting of icixr_bypass.</description> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <formula>OR ( rstk__icixr_soorddmd__r.rstk__soorddmd_soline__r.rstk__soline_useconfig__c = true, AND ( ISPICKVAL(rstk__icixr_soorddmd__r.rstk__soorddmd_soline__r.rstk__soline_prodtype__c, 'Configured'), rstk__icixr_soorddmd__r.rstk__soorddmd_soline__r.rstk__soline_usestock__c = false ), AND(rstk__icixr_ordtype__c = 'M', !ISBLANK(rstk__icixr_wocst__r.rstk__wocst_soline__c)))</formula> <formulaTreatBlanksAs>BlankAsZero</formulaTreatBlanksAs> <inlineHelpText>Used internally</inlineHelpText> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>formula_bypassmrp</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>0</precision> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>0</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>false</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Checkbox</type> <unique>false</unique> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This is an internal system field used to define the externalID of a record. which is also an internal system field. Neither is currently displayed on any Rootstock User pages.

toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__formula_extid__c
toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>rstk__icixr__c.rstk__formula_extid__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <formula>rstk__icixr_icitem__r.rstk__externalid__c & '_' & rstk__icixr_proj__r.rstk__pjproj_proj__c & '_' & rstk__icixr_site__r.rstk__sysite_site__c & '_' & rstk__icixr_ordtype__c & '_' & rstk__icixr_ordno__c & '_' & Text(rstk__icixr_lne__c) & '_' & Text(rstk__icixr_lnerel__c)</formula> <inlineHelpText>This is an internal system field used to define the externalID of a record. which is also an internal system field. Neither is currently displayed on any Rootstock User pages.</inlineHelpText> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>Formula External Id</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>0</precision> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>0</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>false</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Text</type> <unique>false</unique> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>

Neither is currently displayed on any Rootstock User pages.</inlineHelpText> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>Formula Search Index</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>0</precision> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>0</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>false</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Text</type> <unique>false</unique> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: When enabled (set to TRUE) this field causes the MRP process to bypass this requirement as if it didn’t exist.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Exclude Requirement from MRP
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__icixr_bypass__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This is the date a demand is required or a supply is needed to fulfill a requirement.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Date Required
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__icixr_dtereqd__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Requirement Demand Netting Option: 1 - Net all demands against forecast. 2 - Net only independent demands
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Net Forecast Demand Option
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__icixr_fcstdmdnetopt_pl__c
toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>rstk__icixr__c.rstk__icixr_fcstdmdnetopt_pl__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <description>The values can be: Net all demands against forecast Net only independent demands If null or ‘Net all demands against forecast’ then all demands (both dependent and independent) are netted against a forecast (all demands are subtracted from the forecasts demand until it is depleted and only the remainder is applied as demand in MRP). An independent demand is: Sales Order A dependent demand is: PO Subcontract Requisition Demand Work Order Demand PO Subcontract Order Demand If ‘Net only independent demands’ then only independent demands are netted against a forecast (only independent demands are subtracted from the forecasts demand until it is depleted and only the remainder is applied as demand in MRP). This field is only applicable if the Order Type is ‘0’ for Forecast Demand - See corresponding field (ICFCSTDMD_DMDNETOPT) in Forecast Demand record. (DD)</description> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <inlineHelpText>Requirement Demand Netting Option: 1 - Net all demands against forecast. 2 - Net only independent demands</inlineHelpText> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>Net Forecast Demand Option</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>0</precision> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>0</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>true</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Picklist</type> <unique>false</unique> <valueSet> <restricted>false</restricted> <valueSetDefinition> <sorted>false</sorted> <value> <fullName>Net all demands against forecast</fullName> <default>false</default> <isActive>false</isActive> <label>Net all demands against forecast</label> </value> <value> <fullName>Net only independent demands</fullName> <default>false</default> <isActive>false</isActive> <label>Net only independent demands</label> </value> </valueSetDefinition> </valueSet> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Line id of this Requirement's corresponding Order
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Line No
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__icixr_lne__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText:
Requirements Order Type. Values are

M (Work Order Supply)
N (Disassembly Supply)
P (Purchase Order)
R (Requisition Supply)
6 (WO Component Demand)
4 (Subcontract PO Demand)
1 (SO Line Demand)
0 (Forecast Demand)
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Order Type
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__icixr_ordtype__c
